column2: A pure-Java Markdown processor based on a parboiled PEG parser supporting a number of extensions

column5:

Add some useful badges with automatic version detection: Maven and Javadoc

Merge pull request #195 from vsch/master

A few fixes accumulated from my plugin releases.
change instance of to class comparison, we want exact class match not derived classes.
udate readme to include ANCHORLINKS and EXTANCHORLINKS.

add EXTANCHORS optional extension to include all child text nodes of the header as part of the anchor name generator text, text accumulated, special chars ignored. Fix #194
fix #190, two or more blank lines between list items would break the list into separate lists
fix #191, completed task list items could have capital X not just lowercase. [X] and [x] are equivalent.
fix #192, paragraph wrapping for list items would produce an AST different from how blank lines before list items. Now identical.
fix #193 change private to protected methods in ToHtmlSerializer so that it can be extended without duplicating code
Fix for issue 188: update the test data with correct character positions

Merge pull request #169 from Deraen/updated-taglist

Updated taglist
add test validating that a fenced block is only closed with the same number of ticks, no more and no less
update readme for mods merged to master
update readme, revert develop only branch changes

Merge pull request #174 from vsch/master

Fix for compound nested list issues, new tests + updated regression tests for corrected parser.
modify readme to reflect fork modifications in the develop branch

fix paragraph followed by fenced code without a blank line would generate code block inside paragraph
add this case to the fenced code blocks file

fixed list parsing, para parsing, sub-list loose first item
fixed node source range going beyond the end of stream and para node would include trailing blank lines
updated tests to reflect new parser operation
NOTE: now the first list item is only made loose if the second list item has a blank line above it. Sub-Items do not make parent list items loose.

fix compound nested lists, including loose list item vs compact list items
change definition list rules to a copy of the old ListItem rule so deflist parsing is not affected by list parsing

fix parsing of sub-lists, sub-sub-lists with code, para and blank lines interleaved. add formatting to
  • tag if it is a loose item so that its children are indented add \n before printing of the

    tag so the HTML hierarchy can be seen.

Use set for taglist and add tests for html5 blocks

Tested using AST tests because normal tests are passed through jTidy
which doesn't understand HTML5 tags.

Add withHtmlSerializer to PegDownPlugins.
Add new helper method to PegDownProcessor to supply list of
ToHtmlSerializerPlugin's to ToHtmlSerializer.

This change should make it possible to add parser and HTML
serializer plugins without a custom PegDownProcessor.

Merge pull request #87 from Elmervc/master

Improved handling of emph/strong. Fixes #43, #65, #78
Adds tests for emph/strong handling to scala test suite
Updated tests to reflect new behaviour and impl of emph/strong sequences
Fix for emph/strong nested in other supernodes (h1,h2 etc) + support strong prefix (github style)

Improved handling of emph/strong. Fixes #43, #65, #78

* No more exponential parse times by the nature of emph/strong combined in PEG
* Parsing of more complex (nested) emph/strong constructs is now really close to original Markdown

Fixes #32
add support for GitHub-style wiki links
add support for GitHub-style wiki links

Merge pull request #23 from nicoulaj/develop

Fix broken Java 1.5 compatibility
Allow to extend ToHtmlSerializer by making fields/methods protected and not private
Fix small problem with AutoLink delimiters
Improve single quoting rules for Smartypants extension
Remove tabstop expansion, it prevents proper AST node index building
Rename test file resources from *.text to *.md
Fix another issue with incorrect AST node indices
Fix remaining issues with incorrect AST node indices in list items and blockquotes
Improve benchmark: Add run with all extensions enabled
Add missing marker for new special characters introduced by Definition List and Fenced Code Block extension
Add extension supporting PhpMarkdownExtra-style Fenced Code Blocks
Fix AST indices for ListItems and Blockquotes

Add support for PhpMarkdownExtra style definition lists

including improvement proposal from http://www.justatheory.com/computers/markup/modest-markdown-proposal.html
Fix problem with code blocks containing blanklines in list items (introduced in refactoring of previous commit)
Completely refactor list parsing for loc, performance and simplicity
Implement index keeping for AST nodes
Add basics for coming index support in AST nodes
Fix: special characters not encoded correctly in plain text sections
Fix: HTML hex entities incorrectly parsed
Change Parser from BaseParser<Node> to BaseParser<Object>
Add 'Hacking on pegdown' section to README
Fix excessive backtracking bug on parsing larger blocks of 'opening-tags-only' HTML
Small fixes corresponding to recent ones in peg-markdown
Small performance and architecture improvements in parser
Opened up PegDownProcessor and Parser to custom extensions
Switch from Ant to Buildr, change to Mavenized project layout
Completely overhaul and clean up basic architecture, separate out HTML generation into AST visitor
Temporarily removed single test with faulty filename
Readded phpmarkdown tests (with proper directory name)

Changes to 0.8.5.4 version of Pegdown module
- Parser.java : Wildcard to specific imports and removed unneeded warnings
- PegDownProcessor.java : Converted to htmlVisitor.visit invocation as a separate printer
- Visitor.java (new file) : Simple visitor interface that can be passed to Node.accept
- Printer.java : Is a delegate visitor with a aregistry of specific Node type to Visitor mapping
- org.pegdown.ast.* classes : replaced 'print' with 'accept(visitor)' in Node.java for separate printers
- Ran the test cases successfully with changes using "ant test"
Fixed bug causing the disappearance of text elements in certain list constructs
Switched off superfluous parse tree building resulting in nearly double parsing performance
Added options to suppress HTML output
Upgraded to parboiled4j 0.9.8.2, added six @MemoMismatches annotations for a ~5% speedup
Upgraded to parboiled 0.9.8.1, small test improvements
Upgraded to latest parboiled snapshot (pre 0.9.8), added profiling run to benchmark
Many bug fixes and further increased test coverage
Bug fixes in Abbreviation extension, implemented TABLES extension
Added very simple benchmark to the tests
Major refactoring paving the way for more complicated extensions
Fixed problem with SetextHeading2, implemented HARDWRAPS extension
Added abbreviations extension and more tests
